reviewText:
It is nice for kids to see other kids speak the language and train their ear as to how the language sounds coming from real people. It has French subtitles. The kids will raise up an object which cues one in as to what they are singing about. It would be nice to have a cartoon in the background to illustrate more of the words in context. It is a little difficult to understand the children, but that is just a matter of training the ear.

Another downside is that the pauses between songs are too long and they roll the credits after every song.
